class ornl.entertainment_factory.EntertainmentFactory(config)¶

Bases: object

This factory class will provide an implementation to provide activities, either indoor or outdoor, based on weather conditions.

…

Parameters

ornl.entertainment_service module¶

class ornl.entertainment_service.EntertainmentService(config)¶

Bases: object

A class that will find entertainment. It considers the city you live in and the weather there to make a judgement if you should do an indoor or outdoor activity.

…

Variables

config (dict) – A dictionary containing all the config values.

check_weather_is_good(city=""):

Logs info messages.

find_entertainment(city=""):

Logs warning messages.

log_error(msg_text=""):

Logs error messages.

find_entertainment(city)¶

Will find “entertainment” (A single text sentence suggesting an activity) based on the weather. If the weather is good it will provide outdoor activities. If it is bad, it will return an indoor activity. It will also save the current activity and weather to the database.

Parameters

city (str) – The city to check the weather in

Returns

activity – A sentence describing an indoor or outdoor activity

Return type

str

ornl.weather_sensor_service module¶

class ornl.weather_sensor_service.WeatherSensorService(config)¶

Bases: object

A class to lookup weather, based on the city passed in.

…

Variables

  • config (dict) – A dictionary containing all the config values.

  • logger (object) – A class that mocks logging capability

  • base_url (str) – The base url for the weather rest endpoint

  • query_string_template (str) – Appended to the base_url, it contains the query params required for the REST endpoint.

  • api_ky (str) – The api key needed to access the REST endpoint

get_weather(city=""):

Gets a weather report, in json format, for the city passed in.

get_weather(city)¶

Gets a weather report, in json format, for the city passed in.

Parameters

city (str) – The city to query the endpoint by.

Returns

city_weather – The weather report for the city.

Return type

dict || None
